text.tspan: I‚Äôm the product architect: ideas, flows, features, systems thinking. What broke me wasn‚Äôt effort‚Äîit was the lack of a reliable execution bridge
under financial pressure and mental overload. Now the strategy is simple:

g.text: A fixed astronomical peak that forces closure. Definition: complete, showable, closed (not perfect).
A portable ‚Äúidea operating system‚Äù that turns scattered knowledge into a structured vault and guided execution.
Builders with scattered data, broken repos, too many tools, and loops. Especially ADHD brains that need guided next steps.
Short-term breathing room now ‚Üí long-term upside later, with transparency.

text.tspan: on every app (net revenue defined in writing)

g.text: One trusted solo dev who ships and mentors ‚Äúvibe coding‚Äù (knowledge transfer).

text.tspan: per project we build together (in writing)
Collaboration request, not investment advice. No guaranteed returns. Revenue share and ‚Äúnet revenue‚Äù definitions are subject to a written agreement. NDA required before sensitive details.

text.font-family: ui-monospace,SFMono-Regular,Menlo,Monaco,Consolas,'Liberation Mono','Courier New',monospace
text.tspan: AI: prompt packs + tool registry per project
Storage: vault items + optional embeddings later

text.font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Helvetica, Arial

g.text: GENERATED MINDMAP ‚Ä¢ IDEA ‚Üí MARKET FLOW (PROOF OF PRODUCT THINKING)
